attributes.action: make it illegal to use the lords name in vain in media
attributes.additional_details:
GOD, JESUS! Is our only Lord and saviour.
 He bled was beaten and nailed to the cross for our sins.
HE died for us because HE loves us!
For our salvation! HE paid the ultimate price for our sin.
 We do not have the right to use HIS holy name as a curse word!
Stop the use of the cursing 'oh my GOD, ' 'Jesus Christ ' etc from tv and radio. It's sinful.
